flawed_nl_solution:
When Trevor is 11, his older brother will be 11 x 3 = <<11*3=33>>33 years old.
Trevor’s older brother is 20 - 11 = <<20-11=7>>7 years older than Trevor.
Since Trevor is 7 years younger, Trevor will be 33 - 7 = <<33-7=26>>26 years old.
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
